name: Nikah Junction
desc: A user-focused Muslim matrimony platform that connects potential matches through direct communication and personal assistance, streamlining the matchmaking process with essential registration and verification steps, using React.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Firebase (authentication and Firestore), and Cashfree for payment integration.

name: Rest Countries API

name: Quiz App
desc: A dynamic and interactive quiz app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows users to answer multiple-choice questions, view their score.

desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!
